name: Cube Wars
description:
Local multiplayer brawl game!

Grab control of one of the Energy Cubes, grab as many coins(points) as you can while you try to push off your opponents!

  • 2-4 Players!
  • Features 6 different levels!

NOTE: One controller per player required, no keyboard controls.

Cube wars is brought to you by:

Pablo Sarmiento, Luca Salfi, Artina Ferizi and Kenneth Teirlynck
